p: The extract obtained from basil leaves (OBHE) presents a percent of DPPH inhibition almost comparable with the value obtained for standard reference (89% vs. 95%). Regarding the analyzed concentrations of OBHE hydro-alcoholic extracts, the antioxidant activity (AOA) values (61% at 50 µg/mL and 36% at 25 µg/mL) were higher compared with the analyzed concentrations of OBAE hydro-alcoholic extracts (34% at 50 µg/mL and 22% at 25 µg/mL), but smaller compared with the OBAE stock solution (68% at 100 µg/mL).
